00025 /* Common information for Renesas video buffers */
00026 #ifndef __REN_VIDEO_BUFFER_H__
00027 #define __REN_VIDEO_BUFFER_H__
00028 
00029 /* Notes on YUV/YCbCr:
00030  * YUV historically refers to analogue color space, and YCbCr to digital.
00031  * The formula used to convert to/from RGB is BT.601 or BT.709. HDTV specifies
00032  * BT.709, everything else BT.601.
00033  * MPEG standards use 'clamped' data with Y[16,235], CbCr[16,240]. JFIF file
00034  * format for JPEG specifies full-range data.
00035  * All YCbCr formats here are BT.601, Y[16,235], CbCr[16,240].
00036  */
00037 
00039 typedef enum {
00040         REN_UNKNOWN,
00041         REN_NV12,    
00042         REN_NV16,    
00043         REN_RGB565,  
00044         REN_RGB24,   
00045         REN_BGR24,   
00046         REN_RGB32,   
00047         REN_ARGB32,  
00048 } ren_vid_format_t;
00049 
00050 
00052 struct ren_vid_rect {
00053         int x;      
00054         int y;      
00055         int w;      
00056         int h;      
00057 };
00058 
00060 struct ren_vid_surface {
00061         ren_vid_format_t format; 
00062         int w;      
00063         int h;      
00064         int pitch;  
00065         void *py;   
00066         void *pc;   
00067         void *pa;   
00068 };
00069 
00070 struct format_info {
00071         ren_vid_format_t fmt;    
00072         int y_bpp;      
00073         int c_bpp;      
00074         int c_bpp_n;    
00075         int c_bpp_d;    
00076         int c_ss_horz;  
00077         int c_ss_vert;  
00078 };
00079 
00080 static const struct format_info fmts[] = {
00081         { REN_UNKNOWN, 0, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00082         { REN_NV12,    1, 2, 1, 2, 2, 2 },
00083         { REN_NV16,    1, 2, 1, 1, 2, 1 },
00084         { REN_RGB565,  2, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00085         { REN_RGB24,   3, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00086         { REN_BGR24,   3, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00087         { REN_RGB32,   4, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00088         { REN_ARGB32,  4, 0, 0, 1, 1, 1 },
00089 };
00090 
00091 static inline int is_ycbcr(ren_vid_format_t fmt)
00092 {
00093         if (fmt >= REN_NV12 && fmt <= REN_NV16)
00094                 return 1;
00095         return 0;
00096 }
00097 
00098 static inline int is_rgb(ren_vid_format_t fmt)
00099 {
00100         if (fmt >= REN_RGB565 && fmt <= REN_ARGB32)
00101                 return 1;
00102         return 0;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static inline int different_colorspace(ren_vid_format_t fmt1, ren_vid_format_t fmt2)
00106 {
00107         if ((is_rgb(fmt1) && is_ycbcr(fmt2))
00108             || (is_ycbcr(fmt1) && is_rgb(fmt2)))
00109                 return 1;
00110         return 0;
00111 }
00112 
00113 static inline size_t size_y(ren_vid_format_t format, int nr_pixels)
00114 {
00115         const struct format_info *fmt = &fmts[format];
00116         return (fmt->y_bpp * nr_pixels);
00117 }
00118 
00119 static inline size_t size_c(ren_vid_format_t format, int nr_pixels)
00120 {
00121         const struct format_info *fmt = &fmts[format];
00122         return (fmt->c_bpp_n * nr_pixels) / fmt->c_bpp_d;
00123 }
00124 
00125 static inline size_t size_a(ren_vid_format_t format, int nr_pixels)
00126 {
00127         /* Assume 1 byte per alpha pixel */
00128         return nr_pixels;
00129 }
00130 
00131 static inline size_t offset_y(ren_vid_format_t format, int w, int h, int pitch)
00132 {
00133         const struct format_info *fmt = &fmts[format];
00134         return (fmt->y_bpp * ((h * pitch) + w));
00135 }
00136 
00137 static inline size_t offset_c(ren_vid_format_t format, int w, int h, int pitch)
00138 {
00139         const struct format_info *fmt = &fmts[format];
00140         return (fmt->c_bpp * (((h/fmt->c_ss_vert) * pitch/fmt->c_ss_horz) + w/fmt->c_ss_horz));
00141 }
00142 
00143 static inline size_t offset_a(ren_vid_format_t format, int w, int h, int pitch)
00144 {
00145         /* Assume 1 byte per alpha pixel */
00146         return ((h * pitch) + w);
00147 }
00148 
00149 static int horz_increment(ren_vid_format_t format)
00150 {
00151         /* Only restriction is caused by chroma sub-sampling */
00152         return fmts[format].c_ss_horz;
00153 }
00154 
00155 static int vert_increment(ren_vid_format_t format)
00156 {
00157         /* Only restriction is caused by chroma sub-sampling */
00158         return fmts[format].c_ss_vert;
00159 }
00160 
00161 /* Get a new surface descriptor based on a selection */
00162 static inline void get_sel_surface(
00163         struct ren_vid_surface *out,
00164         const struct ren_vid_surface *in,
00165         const struct ren_vid_rect *sel)
00166 {
00167         int x = sel->x & ~horz_increment(in->format);
00168         int y = sel->y & ~vert_increment(in->format);
00169 
00170         *out = *in;
00171         out->w = sel->w & ~horz_increment(in->format);
00172         out->h = sel->h & ~vert_increment(in->format);
00173 
00174         if (in->py) out->py += offset_y(in->format, x, y, in->pitch);
00175         if (in->pc) out->pc += offset_c(in->format, x, y, in->pitch);
00176         if (in->pa) out->pa += offset_a(in->format, x, y, in->pitch);
00177 }
00178 
00179 #endif /* __REN_VIDEO_BUFFER_H__ */
